title: Fleet Footwork AP scaling nerfs were too much
body: Kinda feels bad to take on melee ap champs now, barely heals you at all later on. Used to get 5k healing by the end of the game but now I only get around 2.8k(as Mordekaiser). Why was this even nerfed? Being able to pick adaptive stats doesn't make up for the loss of scaling, which was the intention.

replies.body: The point of that change was probably because it made Kassadins laning phase to safe and I personally am glad that it got reduced.
